title: Caribbean fruity salsa
ingredients: ['225g diced fresh mango', '75g diced fresh pineapple', '75g diced papaya', '1 fresh jalapeno or green chilli, seeded and minced', '1/2 medium red onion, finely diced', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint']
